nodes.text: Air Alderaan was a travel agency that was a member of the Galactic Tourist Bureau. It served as an official spaceline of the Imperial Senate. Prior to the Battle of Yavin, the company offered daily nonstop trips to Alderaan and Coruscant on board a fleet of customized StarSpeeder 1000s. At the time, Air Alderaan operated a spaceliner terminal on Spaceport THX1138's south wing.
